### 2.1 Some R Code Demo
Content will be available later
```{r TestRCode, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE}
n <- 100
p <- 40
sigma <- 1
set.seed(1)
sim <- mlbench.friedman1(n, sd = sigma)
colnames(sim$x) <- c(paste("real", 1:5, sep = ""), paste("bogus", 1:5, sep = ""))
bogus <- matrix(rnorm(n * p), nrow = n)
colnames(bogus) <- paste("bogus", 5+(1:ncol(bogus)), sep = "")
x <- cbind(sim$x, bogus)
y <- sim$y
```

### 2.2 There may be a plot here

```{r Plot1, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=10, fig.height=5}
library(ggplot2)

set.seed(20150308)
df1 <- data.frame(X=sample(1:1000, 100, replace=T), Y=sample(1:1000, 100, replace=T),
						Code=sample(LETTERS[1:5], 100, replace=T))

ggplot(df1, aes(x=X, y=Y, fill=Code)) +
	labs(title="The Nuclear Decay Cycle", x="Orbital Period", y="Particle Energy") +
	geom_point(shape=21, size=6, alpha=0.7)
```
